Name: Bitku
About the game: What is BITKU? - A simple storyteller - A short comic creator - A strange art toy - A new way to express yourself in pixels... BITKU is all or none of the above, and totally FREE with no IAP. Here's how it works: 1) Choose a theme 2) Get 10 random cards related to that theme, each of which has a single background or multi-frame object 3) Make a 1-4 panel comic or story with the contents of those cards. Add text, recolor anything, enlarge, rotate, etc. 4) Save your creation as a PNG and share it with the world!
